name: Cosmo Moon Side Table
description: The Cosmo Moon side table by Kifu Paris is a whimsical and sculptural piece, inlaid in different options of material mixes including shagreen, parchment or baguio stone with bronze-patina brass accents. This piece is a sister to the original Cosmo side table by Kifu Paris. The amorphous shapes on the bottom part can be moved to adjust the angle of each part. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans.
